node.name: Focus
node.rich_text: Focus kya hota hai?
Focus ka matlab hota hai: 👉
Ek hi kaam par apna pura dhyan lagana.

Baaki saari chize (soch, tension, distractions) dimaag se hata dena. Jaise tu jab HackTheBox ya TryHackMe chalata hai — aur ek machine crack karne mein ghus jaata hai — to tu bhool jaata hai ki phone pe koi notification aayi ya nahi.
Yahi hota hai real focus.
Real Life Example:
Log gym kyun jaate hai jab stress mein hote hain? Kyunki: • Workout karne se
"endorphins"
nikalte hai (happiness chemicals). • Body thak jaati hai, to dimag ko rest milta hai. •
Attention poora body ke movement pe chala jaata hai
, isliye stress waali soch automatically background mein chali jaati hai. • Dimag us stress ko apne aap process kar leta hai â€” bina tere actively sochne ke.
🤯 Focus vs Attention — dono alag hai:
Example
: • Agar tu bolta hai: "Keys kaha gyi?" ➜ Tera
focus
keys dhundhne par hai. • Agar tu bolta hai: "Main late ho gaya!" ➜ Tera
focus
time pe chala gaya, keys par nahi.
Key Baatein:
Focus willpower se aata hai.
Tu decide karta hai ki kya important hai. •
Attention change hoti rehti hai

fast aur smartly apna goal achieve karega.
